project.name: player (1)
project.notes: Take turns to add one sentence to a story. The final story will be shown after everyone has added his/her sentence. Invite your friend, press the flag to start and add your sentence

block.l: We're writing a story, one sentence at at time.
Enter the first sentence of the story:
We're writing a story, one sentence at at time.

variable.name: story
variable.l: there was a boy~he was tall~However, he hated being tall~He decided to shorten himself~One day, he decided to donate his legs to science~He soon realized this was crazy nonsense
